about_the_game:
• Become the owner of a tavern for monsters in a hand-drawn game combining elements of a simulator, narrative and RPG

Cook, mix, develop your tavern and explore the underground city of Undernests in search of the best ingredients. You will raise meat-eating bees and do the dishes using a shifty gelatinous jelly. All this to entertain your guests as best you can.

  • Make tasty dishes and drinks

Cook a Bughetti and mix a Bloody Martini to satisfy the demanding palates of your tavern guests. You will get to squeeze out beetle juice, chop up magic mushrooms and fry the tastiest parts of knight in immersive minigames that will make you experience the monsterful tavern as if you were actually there!

  • Serve tavern guests!

Use the prepared drinks and dishes to feed your guests in an immersive gameplay inspired by turn-based RPGs. Serve orcs, trolls, vampires and other monsters, with their individual tastes and quirks of character. If you do well, your pouch will overflow with eyes – the currency of Undernests.

  • Explore Undernests, an underground city under siege

Explore Undernests, an underground settlement found on the constellation of stalagnates that is plagued by knights' raids, and meet its inhabitants: pay a visit to the goblin workshop, pray in the temple of Big Round Troll, spend a night at the house of ill repute owned by Lady Grey the vampire and buy exotic vegetables in Nole's huge underground corporation.

  • Be a part of an underground community

Walk the path from an ex-carrier to a notable public figure of Undernests. Meet horrifically unusual tavern guests, listen to their stories and jump right into the thick of countless schemes and intrigues. The status of the tavern keeper will help you play a major role in the underground city and change its fate forever.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Become the owner of a tavern for monsters in a hand-drawn 2.5D game combining elements of a simulator, narrative and RPG! Squeeze out beetle juice, fry a knight's thigh, raise meat-eating bees and develop your tavern to meet the expectations of a starving horde of guests.

English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Latin America*, Polish*
